email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We have an inquiry for shipping 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN MASTER, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m. The starting freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. The laycan period is from October 10 to October 15.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42.50 seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the freight rate?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Liam Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The OCEAN MASTER is equipped with modern cargo handling systems, ensuring efficient loading and unloading. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 41.00 per MT.

Please let me know if this revised rate meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised quote. USD 41.00 per MT is more acceptable. Could you confirm the laycan period and provide the final details on the demurrage terms?

Looking forward to finalizing this shipment.

Best regards,
Liam Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Details for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Liam,

I can confirm the laycan period remains from October 10 to October 15. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there is a delay beyond the agreed laydays.

If these terms are acceptable, please let us know so we can proceed with the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

We accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork to finalize the shipment.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
